title: Photos: #pnjpreps action
text: Escambia band laying down some halftime beats. Matt Foster/mrfoster@pnj.com That's PHS defensive tackle Martine Sellers rocking crown as homecoming king. Bill Vilona/bvilona@pnj.com #pnjpreps Escambia 7 @TateFootball 14, 2 min in the half. Ben Twingley/btwingley@pnj.com Arnold attired in pink socks for Breast Cancer Awareness. Bill Vilona/bvilona@pnj.com West Florida band gettin' it. @OldGlory1893/Submitted Fireworks go off as Pace takes field. Patriots to receive opening kick. Thomas St. Myer/tstmyer@pnj.com Pace celebrates 1-yard TD run by Garrett Johnson. Patriots lead Gulf Breeze 7-0 4:59 1Q. Thomas St. Myer/tstmyer@pnj.com New lids tonight for Cat High. Looking sharp. Brady Aymond/baymond@pnj.com New helmets for Catholic High. Bruce Graner/bgraner@pnj.com Gulf Breeze players about to run on the field here at Pace. Thomas St. Myer/tstmyer@pnj.com Milton Panthers ready for Navarre. Brian Achatz/bachatz@pnj.com Pensacola High players set to hit field prior to kickoff. Bill Vilona/bvilona@pnj.com Homecoming court being introduced here at Pace. Kickoff against Gulf Breeze about 15 minutes away. Thomas St. Myer/tstmyer@pnj.com Tonight I'm at EHS as Escambia hosts @TateFootball - kickoff at 7:30. Right now @TateShowband performing #pnjpreps Matt Foster/mrfoster@pnj.com Here at Pace for its homecoming game against Gulf Breeze. Pace section packed, 20 minutes before kickoff. Thomas St. Myer/tstmyer@pnj.com CHS tailgate party warms up fans before start of game against Taylor. Bruce Graner/bgraner@pnj.com PHS players busy at halftime on homecoming night as part of escorts for the homecoming court. Bill Vilona/bvilona@pnj.com Anthony Johnson Jr. 1-yard TD run to pull Pace even with Gulf Breeze 21-all 14 seconds left 1st half. Thomas St. Myer/tstmyer@pnj.com #pnjpreps penalties-a-plenty but some nice plays @TateFootball @BrianAchatzPNJ Ben Twingley/btwingley@pnj.com #pnjpreps halftime @TateFootball 14, Escambia 7. Ben Twingley/btwingley@pnj.com Tristan Covell 5-yard TD reception. Gulf Breeze leads Pace 28-21 with 8:58 left 3Q. Thomas St. Myer/tstmyer@pnj.com Escambia High band performs at halftime.
